meta.description: Quick character summary of Vila Restal

biog.info: Unlocking stuff, nicking stuff, making jokes

figure.figcaption: Blake confronts Vila, during The Way Back.

content.p: Blake encounters Vila in the holding cell at the end of The Way Back. Vila is picking Blake's pockets.

Vila has a few character traits which are similar to Avon: primarily concerned with his own survival, existing on the wrong side of the law and having a high intelligence. However, Vila is much more comfortable in a group than Avon is, and seems to relish the stability of life on The Liberator.
Even Vila and Avon's names seem to mirror each other, the V like an inverted A, each four letters long.

From a narrative point of view, Vila's main skill - lock-picking - and his main weakness - cowardice - mean that he is generally required to be in the thick of the action, where he is most uncomfortable. While this isn't ideal for Vila, it's good for drama.
I quite like Michael Keating's performance. While it can be quite wide, he's not afraid of allowing Vila to be unlikeable.
